## \#1
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(stats)

emratio <- read.csv("../Problem Set 1/EMRATIO.csv")
FLBPP <- read.csv("../Problem Set 1/FLBPPRIVSA.csv")
FLLF <- read.csv("../Problem Set 1/FLLF.csv")
FLNA <- read.csv("../Problem Set 1/FLNA.csv")

df <- inner_join(emratio, FLBPP, by = "DATE")
df <- inner_join(df, FLLF, by = "DATE")
df <- inner_join(df, FLNA, by = "DATE")
write.csv(df, "../Problem Set 1/r_is_better.csv")
colnames(df) <- c("date", "us_epr", "fl_bp", "fl_lf", "fl_nonfarm")
df
```
## \#2
```{r}
df$monthTime <- month(df$date)
df$ln_us_epr <- log(df$us_epr)
df$ln_fl_bp <- log(df$fl_bp)
df$ln_fl_lf <- log(df$fl_lf)
df$ln_fl_nonfarm <- log(df$fl_nonfarm)
df

df_ts <- as.ts(df)
```
